techmeme.title: Google Search adds Ask for me, which uses AI to call businesses to inquire about availability and pricing, starting with nail salons and auto shops in the US (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Sources: OpenAI is in early talks to raise up to $40B at a $340B valuation; the startup was last valued at $157B in October, when it raised $6.6B (Wall Street Journal)
PitchBook: a spike in stock-market volatility due to DeepSeek may further complicate hopes for a rebound in venture-backed IPOs in 2025 (Bloomberg)
Elon Musk is using the same tactics he used during his Twitter takeover at DOGE, including offering exits to federal employees and testing engineering prowess (New York Times)
Google announces a "voluntary exit program" for employees working in the Platforms & Devices group in the US, which includes Android, Chrome, Pixel, and more (Abner Li/9to5Google)
